doc.title: We Said, No Crying
doc.plot: We wished for a child. Following difficulties in conceiving we had begun fertility medical tests. The problem came from me. We embarked a series of treatments that succeeded in creating a twins pregnancy. But then a rare problem in one of the fetuses was diagnosed. We were advised to a selective termination procedure. Birth was no longer an obvious thing. "We said, No crying" filmed from a male's perspective accompanying the director as he confronts his fears of a lost masculinity. And reveals a unique relationship that struggles to manage itself with contradicting emotions of guilt, blame, support and hope.
